alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 11:58PM EDT until March 15 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Pockets of minor coastal flooding and splashover, especially around the time of high tide. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion and splash-over is possible. Localized minor inundation is possible. Large, breaking waves expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/05 PM 9.4 0.6 2.3 13-14 None 15/06 AM 10.1 1.3 1.9 7-8 None 15/07 PM 7.8 -1.0 0.8 4-5 None 16/07 AM 9.5 0.7 1.2 3-4 None 16/08 PM 8.0 -0.8 0.9 3 None 17/08 AM 9.3 0.5 0.8 2-3 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/05 PM 9.8 0.3 2.4 1 None 15/05 AM 10.7 1.2 2.2 0-1 None 15/06 PM 8.0 -1.5 0.8 1-2 None 16/06 AM 9.7 0.2 1.2 1-3 None 16/07 PM 8.3 -1.2 1.0 3 None 17/08 AM 9.5 -0.0 0.8 2-3 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/05 PM 10.0 0.3 1.9 2 None 15/05 AM 11.2 1.5 1.8 1-2 None 15/06 PM 8.6 -1.1 0.7 1 None 16/06 AM 10.5 0.8 1.1 1-2 None 16/07 PM 8.9 -0.8 0.9 1 None 17/07 AM 10.4 0.7 0.8 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
